text: Like everything else, I also have a kind of fear of going too far when I write. What's that supposed to be? - Why? - I don't know. I stop, like I'm holding the reins of a horse that could gallop and take me God knows where. I'm going to reserve. Why and for what? What am I saving for? I was already well aware of that when I once wrote: It is necessary not to be afraid to create. Why fear? Fear of knowing the limits of my ability? Or fear of the wizard's apprentice, who didn't know how to stop? Who knows, just as a woman who reserves herself intact to one day surrender to love, so maybe I want to die whole so that God can have me all. ♪ Finish ♪
title: No soltar los caballos
author: Clarice Lispector
